description.en: Enter the wonderful world of Capybara. In Capybara Go, begin a strategic adventure. You'll be forming and commanding your own little Capybara army. Defeat your opponents and conquer everything through strategy and combat. Lay out your Capybara's to take advantage of each one's strengths and use strategy to defeat powerful enemies.

instructions.en: Mouse click or tap to play

description.en: Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour is a wild and hilarious 2 player platforming experience that blends meme-fueled chaos with classic obby parkour mechanics. Inspired by games like Tower of Hell, this title brings the unpredictable humor of the Italian brainrot meme universe into a 3D climbing challenge. Available characters are: -Tung Tung Sahur -Brr Brr Patapim -Burbaloni Luliloli -Frigo Camelo -Girafa Celestre -Lirili Larila -Orangutini Annaucini -Tralalero Tralala -Vaca Saturno Saturnita

instructions.en: In Single Player Game mode: Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Camera rotate: MOUSE Zoom in/out: MOUSE SCROLL In 2 Player Game mode: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Jump: L Sprint: K

description.en: Obby Survivor Parkour is a fast-paced 3D parkour and escape game designed for players who trust their reflexes. You will test both your speed and balance skills while trying to survive in the obstacle filled course! Each section is full of new traps and platforms that will challenge you even more. Try to survive tsunami waves, obstacle courses, lava attacks, snowball storms and red light green light game and reach the finish line. Can you be one of the few who can reach the end of the course?

instructions.en: PLAYER 1: Movement: "W,A,S,D" Jump: "SPACE" Double Jump: "SPACE + SPACE" Freeze: "Q" Bomb: "E" Acceleration: "F" PLAYER 2: Movement: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "J" Double Jump: "J + J" Freeze: "H" Bomb: "K" Acceleration: "L" Touch controls will be automatically activated on mobile devices such as tablets and phones.

description.en: Play Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow – a relaxing and colorful butterfly-matching puzzle game with fresh mechanics and vibrant rainbow visuals! Enjoy hundreds of exciting levels, earn daily rewards, take part in special events, and unlock beautiful new wings. A fun Mahjong-style connect game for all ages – no download required!

instructions.en: Tap or click two matching butterfly wings to connect them and set them free. Make sure the path between them is clear — other tiles will block the way. Your goal is to clear the entire board as quickly as possible. Stuck? Use boosters to help you out!

description.en: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush is the ultimate blend of color puzzle games, and sorting games! Dive into this stress-relieving world of ASMR games where you match delivery boxes with the right cargo buses by their colors. Perfect for fans of color sort puzzle and fun games, this game is all about strategy, speed, and precision.

instructions.en: Use mouse left button to play

description.en: Help Ellie recreate magical patterns using grass, fire, clouds, and more elements as you uncover the hidden order of each level.

instructions.en: Click on a tile to place down the selected element. Click on an element icon to change the element. Click on a shape icon to change the shape. In Stretch Mode, you can stretch shapes by dragging the arrows.

description.en: Soccer Tournament is a fun and fast-paced tabletop-style soccer game where you control a team of caps, flicking them to pass, shoot, and score goals. Strategize your moves, outplay your opponent, and aim for victory in this exciting, skill-based challenge!

instructions.en: Tap or click the cap (player) and drag to adjust the direction and shooting power. Release to shoot. Kick the ball into the opponent's goal to score points.

description.en: Welcome to Royal Garden Match! You’ve inherited a grand Royal Castle and a once-beautiful garden—now it’s up to you to bring its beauty to life! Solve exciting match-3 puzzles by combining exquisite royal flowers, fruits, and plants to unlock powerful boosters. With hundreds of challenging levels, unique royal characters, and a magical journey ahead, there's always something new to discover. Can you make the royal garden flourish? Play now and start your enchanting adventure!

instructions.en: Match three or more identical icons in this exciting tile-matching game! Swap flowers, fruits, and plants by dragging them to switch places—each move must form a valid match. Keep an eye on the panel to see which items to collect and how many moves you have. Match 4 or 5 pieces to unleash powerful line bursts, cross bursts, and color boosters. Merge boosters for even bigger effects! Strategize your moves, create stunning combos, and complete levels with dazzling garden magic!

description.en: Get ready for a wacky and challenging voice-controlled adventure in Chicken Scream Race! This unique game brings a hilarious twist to platform racing by letting you control your character with both taps and your voice. Whether you’re clucking quietly or screaming loudly, your chicken responds to the intensity of your sound, making each race a chaotic yet exciting experience.

instructions.en: Tap Mode: 1P Mode: Player 1: W or UP ARROW or SPACE 2P Mode: Player 1: W or SPACE Player 2: UP ARROW Voice Mode: 1P Mode: Make some noise to move the chickens. 2P Mode: Players should make noise in turn in order to move the chickens one by one.

description.en: Geometry Vibes Monster is a reaction-based arcade game where you must dodge incoming obstacles, spikes, and battle against a variety of unique monsters. Each monster features distinct attack patterns that you must skillfully avoid. Your main goal is to navigate your spaceship as far as possible while surviving the onslaught of attacks.

instructions.en: Keep your spaceship on course and avoid hitting obstacles. Stay alert for the specific attack patterns of each monster. Click and hold the "MOUSE" or press and hold the "SPACEBAR" to ascend. Release the button to dive downward. In 2,3,4 Player race mode, "UP ARROW", "SPACEBAR" "H" and "L" are used to control.

description.en: Football Rush 3d is a fast-paced, one-touch soccer game that puts you in the boots of a solo football hero. Forget complex controls—just tap, strike, and score! Whether you’re curving shots from midfield or charging down the pitch with speed boosts, every moment is packed with action.

instructions.en: WASD or arrow buttons to move. Hold Left Mouse Button (LMB) to shoot. Press Right Mouse Button(RMB) to pass. Press LMB to tackle. Press C to change camera angle. Press I to disable UI.

description.en: Get ready to navigate through the fast-paced world of healthcare, where every second counts. Your mission as a hyper nurse is to provide exceptional care to patients, manage critical situations, and ensure the smooth operation of the hospital. Get ready to put your multitasking skills to the test as you juggle multiple tasks and make crucial decisions in hyper nurse: hospital games.

instructions.en: Use left mouse button to make choices.

description.en: Deep in the Lab is 2D '90 style survival horror game, with old style pre-rendered backgrounds, puzzles to solve, keys to collect, monster to avoid or defeat (your choice), poor resources, jumpscares, limited saves, FMV and a five floors lab to explore.

instructions.en: AD Move left and right P : Open/Close Menu M : Open Map ESC: Options Menu / Skip Video E: Interact / Use / Open Door CTRL: Draw / Undraw Weapon Left Click: Attack/Shoot Right Click: Roll

description.en: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!

instructions.en: Put the cat-themed tiles on the board. Three of the same tiles will create a tile of higher value. You can also use the Heart and remove some tiles if you get stuck!

description.en: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate realistic traffic and monitor your fuel while exploring busy streets. Enjoy stunning morning city graphics, transforming the city into a spectacle. Pedestrians add unpredictability, and hitting them triggers police chases. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Aventador Vice Crime City offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.

instructions.en: W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake Left Shift: Nitro C: Change Camera G: Slow Motion

description.en: Kingdom match is a competitive match-3 game with castle decoration options! Complete levels, compete with other players and build the best castle!

instructions.en: Collect objects of the same color in a row and complete tasks in the levels! Complete as many levels as possible to get ahead of other players!

description.en: Match Masters is a real-time multiplayer match-3 puzzle game where players compete head-to-head on the same board. Each move requires strategic thinking, as it can benefit both you and your opponent. Utilize unique boosters, participate in tournaments, and climb the global leaderboards in this dynamic and engaging game.

instructions.en: Match 3 or more tiles of the same color to score points. Matching blue stars charges your booster; red circles charge your opponent's. Activate your booster strategically to gain an advantage. Each player takes turns, making every move crucial.

description.en: Block Crasher is a fun and fast-paced mix of classic Bubble Shooters, block-breaking games, and a bit of penalty shooting flair. Your goal is to launch colorful bubbles at moving blocks, match the colors, and score as many points as possible. It’s all about timing, precision, and quick thinking as the blocks keep shifting across the screen.

instructions.en: Aim and release to shoot bubbles at the moving blocks. Match colors to score and clear combos.

description.en: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game. Players can tap identical items to automatically send them to the bottom slot - when three matching items gather, they get eliminated. When players successfully clear all items arranged in the grid, they get to "catch" a mischievous goose. Its addictive simplicity, stress-relieving design, and playful art style have made it a cultural phenomenon.

instructions.en: 1. Tap three identical items to eliminate them. 2. Complete all eliminations to capture the goose. 3. Use power-ups (e.g., Add Slot or Shuffle) for tricky levels.

description.en: Flight Sim is a game where you have to guide aircraft to their landing zones, keep the skies safe to complete the levels to get high score.

instructions.en: How To Play: Guide planes and helicopters in to runway by drawing the paths Don’t crash and complete the level to get high score
